amendment.description: Amendment redirects $2.2 million in funding from DOE's Fossil Energy Research Development budget to the Risk Based Data Management System.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 57 printed in the Congressional Record to increase and reduce necessary expenses for the Fossil Energy Research and Development account by $2,200,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rehberg amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Rehberg.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rehberg amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
